website_summaries.verdict: If you have a 4K TV and want to enjoy the best Xbox gaming experience available, it is well worth giving your favorite games this truly impressive visual upgrade to the ultra-powerful Xbox One X.
pros: Most powerful video game console on the market
Large list of Xbox One X Enhanced games
Giant library of backwards compatible Xbox 360 titles
cons: The Xbox One X is easily the priciest Xbox model on the market

website_summaries.verdict: Sporting 40% more power than competing consoles, gorgeous use of 4K visuals, and an impressive range of top-tier games, if you own a 4K TV and need the best gaming has to offer, we highly recommend getting an Xbox One X.
pros: Arguably the most powerful video game console of all time
True UHD 4K gameplay, video streaming, and Blu-ray
Huge library of Xbox One X Enhanced games
cons: Although the Xbox One X will upscale your games to look even better in 1080p, this console is at its best when paired with a 4K display

customer_reviews.title: A good way to lose your boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Seems like the updates are more frequent. Cant get my boyfriend out of the game room.. design is good. Shipping speed okay. Name personalization was a sticker you had to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Owned this console for 10 days before HDMI port stopped working. The console was manufactured in October 2017 so I’d be hesitant to call this brand new. Called Amazon who connected me with Microsoft and they told me the warranty is only good until August 13, 2019. Microsoft says it appears to have been refurbished since they offer 12 month warranties on new consoles. Even refurbished ones have a 90 day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Unwieldy, awful install procedure
customer_reviews.text: Be warned! No instructions on how to endure device initialization. Forced to create a microsoft account ; no clear descriptions for what "services" cost or even what they are. Then ... I installed a new game, Forza Motorsport 7, which took hours (really) to upgrade and initialize. I had no idea about any of this. Had I known I wouldn't have purchased the unit. Now wondering if I should return it. This device must be one of the ugliest things MS has ever produced. Zero.
customer_reviews.author: John B Buckley

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: I've tested this with my blu-ray discs and my games. Everything has worked nicely. That's the Microsoft quality standard!
customer_reviews.author: WESLEY GOMES

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. Per his comments l would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yavapai

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION!!!!! Refurb NOT NEW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is a refurbished Xbox One X listed and sold as new. Already set up a return and have been refunded by amazon. This is not a new product and caution should be adhered to. Duffles by amazon and sold through a third party. Not as advertised be advised.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Steele

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it Advertised used Xbox one x as like new with box sealed, but box had obvious signs that it had been opened before, had a black strand of human hair, and an Xbox that was not responding because of faulty control. Also you do not get full refund lost money this item was terrible! DO NOT take the chance Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished console.  Freezing.
customer_reviews.text: My Xbox started having issues a month ago. Freezing up. Black screen. I called microsoft support and they said my warranty expired in August 2019. I bought it in July of 2019! Meaning I got a refurbished crap defective console! Don't buy from this seller. You're taking a risk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came in a timely fashion but I am not sure it was new as it was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I am setting up the "new" xbox one as I type and so far everything looks to be going well. My only complaint is that the box it came in looks to have been opened and resealed with new tape. Also, on the back of the xbox it says, "MFR Date 28-June-2018" which makes me think it is not new as it was advertised when I purchased the Xbox one X. Like I said it seems fine so far but I just don't like to feel deceived, especially when spending this kind of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nick DiFiore

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from this seller. This Xbox has had problems from day one and after getting in touch with Microsoft support I found out that this not a new unit as advertised. Total rip off.
customer_reviews.author: j.b.s.

customer_reviews.title: Overheated and no warranty
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about 2 months and then kept overheating. Moved it so all 4 sides were exposed and got fans to push cool air into the intakes. Went to Microsoft Store to get it serviced and they said it was out of warranty so it would be $150 just to send it in to get fixed. Save your money. Buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Christophor W Knox

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: After I ordered the console, I read the reviews because I saw a photo attached to the product in my orders section that showed a console sitting on someone's floor. The reviews had me worried that I might end up with a used console, which is not what I wanted for $500. However, when I got it, I was pleased to see that it was in fact brand new and plays great. It is a great upgrade to the S console. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: AStephens

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM HERE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a month ago, thought it was brand new from Microsoft them selves. Got the Xbox and noticed instead of manufacturing date on the back, it had a service date. I emailed them twice about my concerns and asking if it was new which they said both times that it was new. Actually that’s all the ever said was “it’s new”. Nothing more. Suspicious. Well, a month in and the hard drive is bad. Can’t even start it up. DO NOT BUY FROM HERE
customer_reviews.author: Ceej

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Can’t use does not work properly it freezes and won’t let me play game
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work.
customer_reviews.text: This xbox 1x won't connect to the internet or get it to load properly. I contacted the seller they asked if I'd like to replace it then I never heard anything back. He hasnt been able to play it. He had to use his old Xbox. At this point it was just a waste of money. We called xbox support and factory reset it multiple times and it wont install any games,apps, or updates
customer_reviews.author: JLYNN

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely the best console.
customer_reviews.text: High frame rates. That's the way to go when you play games. Go into options in any Xbox one x enhanced game, and there should be an option to choose between high refresh rate, or enhanced graphics/ higher resolution. If you're using a 4k tv, the resolution will be high enough already. The high frame rate is the way to go. The games look so good when they run smooth. It's worth mentioning that some games are better in high frame rates than others, but for the most part, 3rd person or 1st person games both look better when the motion is clear and smooth. Looks way better than any other system I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fully shuts-down during initial update
customer_reviews.text: After starting it up the system tries to go through an update. The update gets downloaded, but the system powers off when applying the update. I retried multiple times included resetting the system, connecting through wifi, ethernet, offline/usb update and nothing worked. Eventually I gave up and returned the system to Amazon, ended up going to a local retailer instead
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Frost

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Got it on the 13th. Worked great till the 26th. Suddenly the system doesn’t output video. Was in the middle of using it and video stated to flash a black screen twice then went black and didn’t reset. Tried switching inputs and outputs.cable worked fine on same cable and input. Xbox never started working again. This sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark St.Onge

customer_reviews.title: XBox 1 X is Not A Quality Gaming Console (Electronically) Speaking
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact that Microsoft with all of it's billions of dollars in assets can not build a quality piece of merchandise without having it overheat or shut down automatically because I wanted to play a multi-player game online.
customer_reviews.author: Webrunner57

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of the box.  Would not update normally.
customer_reviews.text: Had a very frustrating experience getting this setup. Powered on and asked for wi-fi info, then would not update and gave an error code. Only options on the screen were "try again", "check network settings", and "power off xbox". Took several hours to do an offline update for the xbox (requiring a USB and a windows PC), but that got it working. It makes me doubt this was new. Marked performance improvement over my Xbox one S. Fingers crossed I do not run into further issues. Update - the controller headset port does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Revious

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: Console froze downloading its first game. Restarted it, the console wouldn't turn back on. The light came on, but no display. Tried alternative cords, new outlets... nothing worked. Total defect right out of the box. I'd recommend buying from Microsoft or stores instead, not some third party seller on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Chatty

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: What can I say this is an amazing game console! My son bought this with his own birthday money he had saved up and he’s so super happy the only problem is I can’t get them off of it now! LOL! Small sacrifices. Great gaming console; don’t hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Trash....cuts off on me randomly and dosent update properly ... DO NOT BUY THIS . Go to gamestop if you want an actual NEW on ...false advertisement
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Xbox One X
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my laptop began crashing while playing Forza Horizon 4 due to CPU overheating. That was a few weeks ago and I have been playing it every day and it has been great to have 4K and Dolby Atmos sound while playing games. It's also nice to be able to use the laptop while gaming. Only thing I have noticed is that the batteries in the remote don't last that long... or maybe I just played alot more than I thought!
customer_reviews.author: R. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This Xbox is refurbished. I'm not sure where thats detailed in the ad but I couldn't find it.
customer_reviews.author: Yuichi S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! I bought a refurbished unit from the Amazon warehouse and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JDT

customer_reviews.title: Aweful
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but problems with this xbob 1x. Will never by again through third party. Alot of money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Laura mc ninch

customer_reviews.title: Terrible seller, and product not in working condition.
customer_reviews.text: One star is too nice. This company sends out equipment that is not functioning, gives you “how to fix” info on google for Xbox that didn’t not work. External install of updated Xbox would not download. I would not pay this high of a price for something that does not come in working condition. Terrible seller, does not reply or respond even after everything has been returned. Amazon had to do a claim, and even that took more than the “2 weeks”. If you like broken bits, but this.
customer_reviews.author: Genifer Harrington

customer_reviews.title: It's a One X...just not new
customer_reviews.text: Box had clearly been opened several times before with layers upon layers of reapplied tape and had a huge dent like it had been thrown on the ground. Plastic grill on back of console was bent from impact. Could not have been good for the hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Denizen

customer_reviews.title: Controller broken, no inscription.
customer_reviews.text: Controller that came with the Xbox doesn’t stay connected to the console. Was supposed to come inscribed, nothing there.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Rawle

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - unit stopped working 2 months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit because it’s supposed to support 4K display. But when you use that feature it shuts itself off after a few minutes. Seems to be fine in regular HD mode but I had that on my other unit. Very disappointed. UPDATE - unit no longer works just 3 months after purchase and it’s not supported by Microsoft either. As far as I’m concerned this was theft.
customer_reviews.author: fkunkle

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck of the draw I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Brand New, could have paid the same amount I. Store. After a month, it'll turn on for a half second and shut down again. Have to hard reset almost Everytime using it.
customer_reviews.author: Devan S Edwards

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to hook up and she is busy having fun playing
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Watts Mom of 5 and Grandma to 15

customer_reviews.title: Box damage
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 star rating because I love Xbox but I am giving a 4 star rating because the amazon box my new one x came in was heavily damaged. The entire top of the box was caved in and the Xbox box itself was also slightly damaged. I wasn’t to thrilled when I saw the damage to the boxes but thankfully the Xbox is fine. After spending 383 dollars for this I would expect the box to have no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Rickert

customer_reviews.title: I recommend a case for it because it is not very big. It’s about the size of a zippo lighter
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and how fast it is. Kinda feel it is just a bit expensive but it’s storage size makes up for it
customer_reviews.author: Warren N. Bloss, III

customer_reviews.title: It’s an Xbox
customer_reviews.text: It’s an Xbox, enough said. The only downside is that there are not a lot of GOOD games for for pass.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Console did not work
customer_reviews.text: Console wouldn’t work. Games wouldn’t save; games wouldn’t download; console wouldn’t allow reset. Replaced it with a console bought direct through Microsoft. No problems now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lacek

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade, well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Don't have 4k just 1080p monitor and the lighting effects was unbelievable. Got deal on xbox one x so now my two year old xbox one s is put away for back up. Can't wait till I can afford 4k monitor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend bought me this Xbox One X. It works and runs so perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: It's an Xbox
customer_reviews.text: Microsoft Xbox One X 1TB Console with Wireless Controller: Xbox One X Enhanced, HDR, Native 4K, Ultra HD what else can you say it's an Xbox..
customer_reviews.author: Steven King

customer_reviews.title: Defective system
customer_reviews.text: The console is very defective in everything I do, now it just turns on, but won’t say it’s on the TV, and then it comes on and just sits on a black screen. Make sure the product works in all ways before buying one, or just never buy used like ever.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: seller delivered
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical on the advertisement. I guess age can do that. The box came in sealed, original packing and new. It was a great buy. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Defective upon plug in, dead hard drive
customer_reviews.text: Immediately after power up I’m getting an E105 error code which is a bad hard drive, plus the product box was visibly tampered with/ damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Im impressed by the smaller size but great graphics and smoothness of the gameplay. I mainly bought it for gaming reasons. Whatever your preferred platform, this xbox won’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: TheFluff4x

customer_reviews.title: Opened Box
customer_reviews.text: Box had been opened before receiving it & xbox gold code would not work when we entered the code , not sure if anything else was missing being I wasn't sure what was supposed to be in the box
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: The Xbox one X is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like my Xbox one X so far, the only thing to keep in mind if you're looking to purchase an Xbox one X, the 1 TB isn't enough so you better purchase extra storage to maintain your games library.
customer_reviews.author: Mazen Mallah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend upgrading over Xbox One s
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for the hdr graphics and speed. Games like PUBG look amazing in 4k and the speed makes the load times drastically better and game play more solid.
customer_reviews.author: VantageSupreme

customer_reviews.title: Blu-ray
customer_reviews.text: The Blu-ray didn't work, couldn't even down load my games! WTH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I'd wanted an Xbox One X for a while. Wanted to get one, however, the high price always kept me away. Figured well, they are not going to go down in price. I took the leap. Love Thx
customer_reviews.author: Shayne W. Sowa

customer_reviews.title: I love my Xbox!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been a video game person, but lately I’ve gotten into them more and more. Xbox was my first choice. It was easy to set up and use. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Feliz

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: I had to send it back to Microsoft to get fixed after one week! Note to self never buy an Xbox from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tederail

customer_reviews.title: Bad be careful what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The power cord was the wrong one. Now I have to spend extra to order a cord because they couldn't even check product
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ray

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: It came used, in no part of the description was it said it was used. Controller doesn’t work and consoles got scratches all over it. Never buying from this website again.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely garbage, almost a crime to say this is new.
customer_reviews.text: Was constantly freezing since the time I took it out of the box and would barely even turned on, after one and a half days it completely broke down and hasn’t worked since.
customer_reviews.author: Sahas Inampudi

customer_reviews.title: Xbox one x is the best upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Since hearing the Xbox Scarlett announce. I thought I’d take a step and try to catch up with the latest version of the console. I don’t regret it at all
customer_reviews.author: Mavro

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My xbox came in great shape and it works how any other xbox should work. the only thing that’s the it’s little warped but shouldn’t be a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Never ending result of not working. Failed numerous times to just update the Xbox and then up and running I would turn it on and a black screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it new from this seller, and it works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Problems
customer_reviews.text: Worked for like a week and a half, maybe two and it stopped working randomly.
customer_reviews.author: mrs.fitzwater1018

customer_reviews.title: entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that my console trouble shoots to much. Concerned to the seller ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken and doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought a brand new Xbox from them and it doesn't even turn on. Its broken and really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Buttons
customer_reviews.text: Nice console with buttons instead of touch sensors like the original Xbox one
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pridgen

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected...
customer_reviews.text: Many more options other than just playing games makes using the system very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Horace L McCollin Jr

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a special someone
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to our grandson and he absolutely loves it. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: BMC

customer_reviews.title: Want replacement
customer_reviews.text: Blue ray disc didn’t work sent back to fix and ask for a new ne and all they did was refund me.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service!
customer_reviews.text: Our Xbox One X arrived right on time and was brand new . . . excellent product and used every day.
customer_reviews.author: musman

customer_reviews.title: Great so for well packaged Mint condition
customer_reviews.text: Works great. it is refurbished so I will update in a few weeks but so for I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ricki

customer_reviews.title: Technical issues
customer_reviews.text: Console randomly shuts off on me multiple times while playing video games
customer_reviews.author: Mike renosky

customer_reviews.title: Price is a little steep
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed it nothing to complain its much smaller which is good for space
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage! Got it and it doesn’t even work!!
customer_reviews.author: Blake
